scripts.start:dev-desktop: cross-env ELECTRON_ENV=dev ELECTRON_NUM_WINDOWS=1 env-cmd -f .env.development electron-forge start
scripts.start:dev-desktop-1: cross-env ELECTRON_ENV=dev ELECTRON_NUM_WINDOWS=1 env-cmd -f .env.development electron-forge start
scripts.start:dev-desktop-2: cross-env ELECTRON_ENV=dev ELECTRON_NUM_WINDOWS=2 env-cmd -f .env.development electron-forge start
scripts.start:dev-desktop-3: cross-env ELECTRON_ENV=dev ELECTRON_NUM_WINDOWS=3 env-cmd -f .env.development electron-forge start
scripts.start:dev-desktop-4: cross-env ELECTRON_ENV=dev ELECTRON_NUM_WINDOWS=4 env-cmd -f .env.development electron-forge start
scripts.start:dev-web: cross-env SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PORT=3001 env-cmd -f .env.development craco start
scripts.start:prod-web: cross-env SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PORT=3001 env-cmd -f .env.production craco start
scripts.build:prod-web: cross-env SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true PORT=3001 env-cmd -f .env.production craco build
